Alternate Contact: Cindy McKay, Member; Phone: 250.762.8414; Email: cansoda@shaw.ca
Service Details: - Offers a support group for individuals with Movement Disorder/Dystonia which is involuntary muscle contractions that cause a sustained, twisted or abnormal posture- Actively supports Dystonia Awareness Week in June- Member of the Dystonia Medical Research Foundation of Canada
Meetings: - Meets 4 times per year- Please call for details
